summary: Branding and contact info were updated in several UI components (header, footer, contact details card, about page). However, the requested new logo asset file itself is not shown as added, and some contact/address strings do not exactly match the provided values. Home page hero still uses “Global Freight …” wording rather than the updated branding.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-provided logo image frgmtlogo.png to frontend/public/assets/ so it is available at a stable public path (e.g., /assets/frgmtlogo.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The header/footer now reference /assets/frgmtlogo.png, but the diff shows no added files, so there is no evidence the static asset was actually added under frontend/public/assets/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the exact provided Office Address string everywhere it appears: “Di LOGISOLUTIONS, A89, ROAD NO 2, MAHIPALPUR, NEW DELHI,110037”.
missing_requirements.reason: The office address is split across lines and includes a space after the comma in “NEW DELHI, 110037”, which does not match the exact provided formatting “NEW DELHI,110037”.

missing_requirements.requirement: Show the exact provided Registered address: “RZK-2/326-I, Khasra No. 85/17, Block K-2, Nihal Vihar, Nangaloi, West Delhi, Delhi, 11004”.
missing_requirements.reason: The registered address displayed ends with postal code “110041”, not “11004” as provided.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace remaining GlobalFreight brand mentions in prominent marketing headings/titles with the updated branding so the site consistently reflects Di Logisolutions/Di Logisolution.
missing_requirements.reason: The Home page hero H1 still reads “Global Freight Solutions for Your Business” rather than using the updated company branding.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx (H1: "Global Freight Solutions for Your Business")
